name: Organic Witch Hazel / Organic Facial Toner /
description:
This is what witch hazel should appear like. It has not been distilled repeatedly to remove all of its beneficial qualities that impart its color. Use it to balance skin, even out texture and tone, treat blemishes and acne, or deep cleanse pores. Witch hazel is the ideal toner, and you will notice a significant improvement in the way your skin behaves.

Use on a cotton ball and rub on freshly washed face.

4oz glass bottle with plastic cap, containing distilled water, witch hazel bark, and grain alcohol.Certified organic, non-GMO, cruelty-free, and free from harmful chemicals. Zero waste company with eco-friendly packaging and production practices.
